works for me. Please try by creating a new profile and check if you are able to reproduce.

comments.text: I saw a few reports in a german Forum that the Feedback button was gone after upgrading from b7 to b8. Installing the testpilot addon (?) again over the already installed one solved that for most people.
comments.creator: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.raw_text: I saw a few reports in a german Forum that the Feedback button was gone after upgrading from b7 to b8. Installing the testpilot addon (?) again over the already installed one solved that for most people.
